title: Chicken, Bacon and Potato Soup
ingredients: ['6 rashers streaky bacon, diced', '4 spring onions, chopped', '1 onion, chopped', '415ml chicken stock', '2 large potatoes, diced', '650g frozen sweetcorn', '4 skinless, chicken breast fillets, cut into cubes', '3 tablespoons chopped fresh thyme', '500ml single cream', 'salt to taste', 'ground black pepper to taste']
